product_name: Seattle Sports Hydralight Rain Rider Bike Pannier - Single
long_description: Waterproof and lightweight, the Seattle Sports Hydralight Rain Rider single bike pannier protects your gear without weighing you down while pedaling through a soggy commute or multiday bike tour. Pannier is made with lightweight, PVC-free urethane-coated nylon with radio frequency-welded seams to deliver waterproof protection for your belongings. Roll-top closure ensures protection from the elements and allows easy access to the main compartment; top compression strap helps cinch down load for jostle-free carrying. Adjustable pannier mounting system fits most bike racks and can used on either side of the front or back rack (racks sold separately). Exterior pocket has a splash-resistant zipper. Seattle Sports Hydralight Rain Rider bike pannier comes with a detachable shoulder strap for easy carrying while it's off the bike.
short_description: Waterproof and lightweight, the Seattle Sports Hydralight Rain Rider single bike pannier protects your gear without weighing you down while pedaling through a soggy commute or multiday bike tour.
